Powers.DescLong: Leather Jackets gives the Enforcer some resistance to Lethal Damage. He can fire a Burst and Heavy Burst with his Sub-machine Gun. He is also a very good leader and can buff the Defense of all nearby thugs with his Leadership skills in Maneuvers.
When all else fails, you have only your two fists to depend on.
Your Defense has been reduced by fire from the UZI.
Your Defense has been reduced by fire from the UZI.
This Thugs Defense to all attacks is improved due to good leadership in Maneuvers from your Lieutenant.
